document.full_text: katy perry's "e.t.," featuring kanye west, spent a second week at no. 1 on the billboard hot 100 singles chart on thursday, bolstered by the premiere of its effects-heavy video a week ago.
document.title: katy perry, rihanna lead u.s. singles chart
lines_and_colors: katy perry's "e.t.," featuring kanye west, spent a second week at no. 1 on the billboard hot 100 singles chart on thursday, bolstered by the premiere of its effects-heavy video a week ago.
